mapper.select: SELECT c.DOREGULAR, c.CONTENT, IFNULL(c.RESULT1, '--') RESULT1, IFNULL(c.RESULT2, '--') RESULT2, IFNULL(c.RESULT3, '--') RESULT3, IFNULL(c.RESULT4, '--') RESULT4 FROM `crecord` c WHERE c.ASSETNUM = #{0} and c.PARTLOC=#{1} and c.DODATE BETWEEN #{2} and #{3}
